overview: Artist:The Brian May Band  Location:VH1 Studios, London,UK  Date: Broadcast on 16.9.98 (Recorded on an Earlier Date)  Quality:Excellent  This is Brian's semi acoustic set from his VH1 appearance promoting Another World with wonderful versions of Tie Your Mother Down & Driven By You.  1.On My Way Up  2.Driven By You  3.Why Don't We Try Again  4.Only Make Believe  5.Tie Your Mother Down (with intro story)
title: Brian May: VH1 Unplugged
